LanguageData.AYCompostBarrel.label: Potting Mix Composting barrel
LanguageData.AYCompostBarrel.description: A barrel in which raw compost, after three and a half days, will become potting mix for herb boxes. The barrel is bit ugly though, and pongs.
LanguageData.AYCompostBarrel_Blueprint.label: Potting Mix Composting barrel (blueprint)
LanguageData.AYCompostBarrel_Frame.label: Potting Mix Composting barrel (building)
LanguageData.AYCompostBarrel_Frame.description: A barrel in which raw compost, after three and a half days, will become potting mix for herb boxes. The barrel is bit ugly though, and pongs.
